cantDelete: The following items can't be deleted because they are delete protected or have dependent items.
proceed: Proceed with deleting the remaining items?
deletePermanently: Delete permanently (This action cannot be undone)

notSupported.single: This item is not supported by the recycle bin.
notSupported.multiple: These items are not supported by the recycle bin.

permanentDelete.unsynchronized:
Unsynchronized edits made to items in a distributed collaboration group will be lost.
${startLink}Learn more${endLink}
permanentDelete.notSupportedAndUnsynchronized:
Some item types are not supported. Unsynchronized edits made to items in a distributed collaboration group will be lost.
${startLink}Learn more${endLink}

canBeRecovered.single: This item can be recovered up to ${days} days.
canBeRecovered.multiple: These items can be recovered up to ${days} days.
canBeRecovered.unknown: These items can be recovered up to ${days} days.

someActionsMayNoLongerWork.single: If you send this item to the recycle bin, some actions that require access to the source item may no longer work as expected.
someActionsMayNoLongerWork.multiple: If you send these items to the recycle bin, some actions that require access to the source items may no longer work as expected.

cannotDelete.all: Items that are delete protected, part of a distributed collaboration group or have dependent items cannot be deleted.
cannotDelete.protectedAndCollaboration: Items that are delete protected or part of a distributed collaboration group cannot be deleted.
cannotDelete.protectedAndDependent: Items that are delete protected or have dependent items cannot be deleted.
cannotDelete.collaborationAndDependent: Items that are part of a distributed collaboration group or have dependent items cannot be deleted.

summary.deletePermanently: Delete permanently: ${count} (This action cannot be undone)
summary.deleteAllPermanently: Delete all items permanently: ${count} (This action cannot be undone)
summary.deleteXPermanently: Delete ${subset} of ${total} items permanently (This action cannot be undone)

protectedGroup.deleteProtectedDescription: Items that are delete protected cannot be deleted.
protectedGroup.itemUsedBy: This item has been used by:

hasDependentItemsDescription.single: This item has a dependent item. They must be deleted together.
hasDependentItemsDescription.multiple: These items have other items dependent on them. They must be deleted together.

protectedGroup.distributedCollaborationDescription: Items that are part of a distributed collaboration group cannot be deleted.

deleteDiscouragedDescription.single: If this item is deleted, dependent items may lose some functionality. You can delete this item from the item details page.
deleteDiscouragedDescription.multiple: If these items are deleted, dependent items may lose some functionality. You can delete these items individually from the item details page.

willBePermanentlyDeleted.single: This item will be permanently deleted because it is not supported by the recycle bin.
willBePermanentlyDeleted.multiple: These items will be permanently deleted because they are not supported by the recycle bin.
willBePermanentlyDeleted.unknown: These items will be permanently deleted because they are not supported by the recycle bin.

willBePermanentlyDeletedCollaboration.single: The selected item belongs to a distributed collaboration group and cannot be moved to the recycle bin. It will be permanently deleted.
willBePermanentlyDeletedCollaboration.multiple: The selected items belong to a distributed collaboration group and cannot be moved to the recycle bin. They will be permanently deleted.
willBePermanentlyDeletedCollaboration.unknown: The selected items belong to a distributed collaboration group and cannot be moved to the recycle bin. They will be permanently deleted.

areYouSure.single: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
areYouSure.multiple: Are you sure you want to delete these items?
areYouSure.unknown: Are you sure you want to delete these items?

areYouSureRecycle.single: This item will stay in the recycle bin for ${days} days before it is permanently deleted.
areYouSureRecycle.multiple: These items will stay in the recycle bin for ${days} days before they are permanently deleted.
areYouSureRecycle.unknown: These items will stay in the recycle bin for ${days} days before they are permanently deleted.

areYouSurePermanent.single: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this ${number} item? This ${carrot} item cannot be recovered after it has been permanently deleted.
areYouSurePermanent.multiple: Are you sure you want to permanently delete these items? These items cannot be recovered after they have been permanently deleted.
areYouSurePermanent.unknown: Are you sure you want to permanently delete these items? These items cannot be recovered after they have been permanently deleted.

folder.mustBeEmpty: The folder ${folder} must be empty in order to be deleted.
folder.aFewCannotBeDeleted: A few items cannot be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting the rest?
folder.mustBeEmptyProceed: The folder ${folder} must be empty in order to be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting these items?
folder.cannotBeDeleted: The folder ${folder} cannot be deleted because its items cannot be deleted.

deleteOverride.single: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this item instead? This action cannot be undone.
deleteOverride.multiple: Are you sure you want to permanently delete these items instead? This action cannot be undone.

restore.noticeMessage: Restored items will be unshared. Please review your content before sharing it again.
restore.cannotBulkRestoreXItems: Cannot bulk restore more than ${number} items, please deselect a few items.
restore.cannotBulkRestoreMultipleOwners: Cannot bulk restore items that belong to different owners. Select items from a single owner to bulk restore.

dependentItems.single: This item cannot be restored because it is dependent on ${parent}. Restore them together.
dependentItems.multiple: These items cannot be restored because they are dependent on other items in the recycle bin. Restore them together:

onboarding.checkItOut: Need to recover that accidentally deleted item? Check out the new recycle bin!
onboarding.takeALook: Take a look at the new recycle bin!
onboarding.learnMore: Learn more about restoring deleted items
onboarding.heldInRecycleBin: Items in the recycle bin are held for up to ${days} days.
onboarding.goToUserRecycleBin: Go to your ${linkStart}recycle bin${linkEnd} to restore or permanently delete items.
onboarding.goToOrgRecycleBin: Go to your ${linkStart}organization's recycle bin${linkEnd} to restore or permanently delete items. Content in the recycle bin continues to consume credits.
